item.title: pandas和sql对照
item.description: 本文参照了 Pandas与SQL对比 - 简书 数据集地址:chipotle.tsv 1 2 3 4 5 6 import pandas as pd file_path='chipotle.tsv' df=pd.read_csv(file_path,sep='\t') print(df.head(5)) print(df.columns) select []获取列 1 df[['order_id','quantity']] loc获取行获取指定
